Note:
Mandl ( 1963 )
cited the species
B. caporiaccoi Netolitzky, 1935
from Tarsee, 2800 m (Prov. of Tehran), but in the revision of
Toledano ( 1999 )
,
B. caporiaccoi
is indicated as subspecies of
B. quadrimaculatum
, and not cited from Iran , The subspecies nearer is
B. quadrimaculatum cardiaderum
;
Samin et al. ( 2011 )
cited the subspecies
B. quadrimaculatum (Linnaeus, 1761 )
from Arasbaran (Prov. of East Azarbaijan); Chahari et al. ( 2009 ) cited the subspecies
B. quadrimaculatum (Linnaeus, 1761 )
from Garmsar (Prov. of Semnan).

Bembidion ( Peryphanes ) morvanianum
M√ºller-Motzfeld, 1986
=
Peryphanes zagrosense
Morvan, 1973
Citations: Aliabad (Prov. of Golestan; Ghahari et al. , 2009 ).

Comment: The occurrence of this species in Iran must be confirmed and the identification should be checked. This species is known from neighbouring Turkmenistan so that its occurrence in North or North east of Iran is possible.
